data.title: Bokajān, Assam, India
data.text:
Bokajan, nestled in Assam, India, is a picturesque town situated at the coordinates of 26.0166700 latitude and 93.7833300 longitude. The weather in Bokajan is characterized by warm and humid summers, followed by mild winters. Its rich history dates back to the ancient Ahom kingdom, leaving behind a legacy of cultural heritage.
